name: Luge Crush 2018
summary:
Bored of crushing things like candy, gems and other stuff? 
Want some action and to feel like an athlete?
Come and play Luge Crush, the fastest game on the store!
Test your reflexes in Luge Crush and challenge your friends! 
Your goal is to ride a luge, avoid obstacles, collect boosts, coins and go as far as you can.
The faster you go, the faster you earn points, but the faster you crash, unless you got skill!

Features:
- Full random track, each run is unique
- Real physics, the luge moves by gravity
- Full 3D game
- Fun and addictive, ride the luge in endless runs
- Simple and intuitive controls
- Obstacles and Boost gates
- Collect coins on track
- Score, Distance and Max Speed indicators
- Musics and sound FX
- 6 Characters to unlock
- 6 Luges to unlock
- Facebook friends leaderboard, challenge your friends to beat your score !
- Share screenshots of your best scores !

Any advice to improve the game is welcome!
Good Luck Have Fun !

Keep in touch :
https://www.lugecrush.com
https://www.facebook.com/lugecrush

Luge Crush is not affiliate to the Olympic Games.
